# New Pokemons:

- Nacli
- Naclstack
- Garnacl
- Capsakid
- Scovillain
- Swirlix
- Slurpuff
- Gulpin
- Swalot
- Galarian Farfetch'd

# Changes to Pokemon & Abilities

- Tropius passive removed and replaced by Signature Dish
- Shuckle passive removed and replaced by Signature Dish

# Changes to Synergies

- New synergy Gourmet: Gourmet PokÃ©mon can be equipped with a Chef's Hat. Chefs will cook up their Signature Dish between fights and feed adjacent allies, providing them with various buffs and effects.

# Changes to Items

- New item category: Dishes ; Dishes are cooked by Gourmet chefs to give strong buffs to a PokÃ©mon in the next fight. If not used by the end of the timer, the cook or another random ally will eat it.

# Gameplay

# UI

- Artificial items are now automatically dropped when benching the unit that was holding them.

# Bugfix

# Misc

- Added experience required per level in Wiki > Data
